posts.post_content:
Poisonous [Ball Lightning](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ball Lightning) with -1/+2 for two more mana? I guess it's alright because two of these would kill someone where it would take 3 ball lightnings to do the same...  
Which brings it to 10 mana across 2 turns vs 9 across 3...  
I guess it comes down whether you like red or green.  
  
You know what? Let's run both.
